arts.ttl: Bukayo Saka gives perfect response to Thomas Tuchel demand in England vs Serbia
arts.sum: Arsenal talisman Bukayo Saka has been challenged to score more goals for England by Thomas Tuchel - and he did just that in the first half of Thursday's game with Serbia

arts.ttl: LIVE World Cup Qualifying: Saka goal puts England ahead over Serbia
arts.sum: Live updates from Wembley Stadium, where Thomas Tuchel's England take on Serbia in a World Cup qualifier that the visitors have a lot more riding on.

arts.ttl: Nico's night, Bellingham's bench: England XI to face Serbia confirmed!
arts.sum: England confirm their starting XI to face Serbia in Thursday's World Cup 2026 qualifier at Wembley.

arts.ttl: England vs Serbia: Build-up as Three Lions return to World Cup qualifying action
arts.sum: Follow build-up before live radio and text commentary as England host Serbia at Wembley in a World Cup qualifier.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham left out of England’s starting line-up to face Serbia
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers has shone in Bellingham’s absence and earned a fourth consecutive start.

arts.ttl: England v Serbia: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
arts.sum: ⚽ World Cup qualifier updates, 7.45pm GMT kick-off ⚽ Live scores | Qualifying clockwatch | Mail Scott ITV also quizzed Tuchel on reading between the lines of his press conferences … “Normally everything I say to you, the guys have already heard it in the locker room, or between us in a chat … I don’t give messages via the camera … everything is already said … they heard the message already … normally this is how I operate.” … the likelihood of any surprise player making a late run for the World Cup squad … “We run out of camps … we have just one more camp … we are running out of matches to try things … but every player has a chance … they compete in the best leagues in Europe … form and attitude and performance will always be rewarded … there is always a chance.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: England vs Serbia LIVE: World Cup qualifier match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.athr: George Flood,Simon Collings and Dom Smith
arts.sum: Three Lions return to Wembley hoping to maintain 100 per cent record under Thomas Tuchel

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham to be benched for England vs Serbia after Thomas Tuchel warning
arts.sum: England face Serbia in the first of two World Cup qualifiers in the November international break and Real Madrid star Jude Bellingham is expected to start on the bench

arts.ttl: Why Jude Bellingham Is on the Bench for England vs. Serbia
arts.sum: Rogers has started England’s last three matches, including September’s 5–0 demolition of Serbia, and Tuchel admitted prior to Thursday’s fixture that the Villa attacking midfielder could not feature alongside Bellingham in England’s current system. England manager Thomas Tuchel has not always seen eye-to-eye with the midfielder since the German’s appointment at the beginning of the calendar year, with Bellingham having played just four times for the Three Lions in 2025.

arts.ttl: How to watch England vs Serbia for free - TV channel, live stream, kick-off info
arts.sum: England will take on Serbia on Thursday, with Thomas Tuchel's Three Lions having already secured their place at next summer's World Cup
